lender.loan_because: I believe that a little help can go a long way.
lender.occupational_info: I am the bookkeeper of a Portland, Oregon business unit of a Fortune 500 public company.

lender.name: Melinda
lender.loan_because: It reminds me that everyone can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I help the owner of my company run her business. My work changes everyday. I do whatever is necessary to make sure our business is successful and our employees are taken care of.

lender.name: Marti
lender.loan_because: if enough of us do this, it could shift the critical mass of the world economy. Really. It could.
lender.occupational_info: I help people who want to make better lives for themselves through higher levels of education, knowledge and skills training.

lender.name: E & A
lender.loan_because: We want to see how people in other parts of the world live, and to learn the value of helping people in need.
lender.occupational_info: We're just kids who like to play, mostly. We have a nice life, and our parents want to teach us about helping people help themselves to become self sufficient, even though we're young still.

lender.loan_because: it makes totally sense.

lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Carolyn

lender.occupational_info: I assist large companies in selling their products and services - by helping them learn what their their customers (and future customers) want or need.

lender.name: jaime
lender.loan_because: I live in Ajijic, Mexico presently volunteering teaching basic computer skills and cooking classes. Kiva gives me another opportunity to give to others.

lender.name: kingi
lender.loan_because: I have run my own fashion design business for over 20 years, and I love it. I want to help people have a chance to run their own businesses, too. Everyone deserves a chance to make their future, and their family's future, better.
lender.occupational_info: I design textile prints, print fabric and make women's clothes.

lender.name: Lucas
lender.loan_because: Every entrepreneur can use some help getting started.

lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because: put simply, I enjoy the prospect of being part of a community that cares enough about the future to invest in the well being of others without the need for personal gain...

lender.name: Rachael
lender.loan_because: I am lucky to live in an amazing country, and am fortunate enough to have more than I could ever need. I want to help people who have less than I do.
lender.occupational_info: I am a librarian, and I work on the internet, archiving publications by lecturers and academics, for the preservation of information.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: They say "If you give a person a fish, you feed them for a day. If you teach a person to fish, you feed them for life." So, if you lend them money to buy a fishing rod, reel and line, you hopefully give them the tools to teach others to fish.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired executive who managed computer systems development and conversions for a very large bank. I really enjoy lending to people who likely cannot qualify to borrow money from banks like the one I used to work for. It is a great way to give back for my good fortune.

lender.name: Kurtis Fluck
lender.loan_because: God put me on earth to distribute wealth.

lender.name: JEREMY
lender.loan_because: Christ tells us to help those in need, and I hope that someone else would help me in my time of need.

lender.occupational_info: I work as an engineer in the marine / shipping industry and have travelled the world extensively on all manner of ships from oil tankers to cruise liners.

lender.name: Rose & Jim
lender.loan_because: As survivors of the devastation that poured down on our beloved city of New Orleans in August of 2005, we must continue to be aware of and grateful for the outpouring of love and help we personally received from family, friends and strangers. From the smallest gesture of a hug to the tremendous financial help that allowed us to return to our home, we received it all in abundance. By lending to others we can in a very small way show our gratitude for the blessings we received.
lender.occupational_info: Rose is a homemaker currently on disability for a chronic illness, Jim is an Auditor for Homeland Security and a part-time musician in New Orleans.

lender.name: Usman
lender.loan_because: Trying to make a difference in the lives of others.

lender.loan_because: I'm blessed to be able to live the life I live. The least I can do is try and give back.

lender.occupational_info:
Teacher, programmer, skeptic. I make sushi, create programming languages, build cabinets and furniture, mix homemade margaritas. I teach students to love what they do and to believe in themselves, to find their own answers, to doubt anyone who makes a dogmatic claim of truth. And I don't watch TV -- ever.
I lived and worked in rural Thailand. I taught them computer science, cooked food and ate with them sitting on the floor, drank and danced with them. They taught me far more than I taught them.

lender.name: Todd
lender.loan_because: I have the good fortune to be able to do so, and money I would otherwise be spending on a meal that's more luxurious than necessary, or something frivolous along those lines, can make a real difference elsewhere.
lender.occupational_info: I build, repair, and maintain stringed musical instruments. It is satisfying personally and I believe it contributes to the world in a positive way; You can't fight someone when your hands are busy playing a guitar. Music also gives young people something constructive to do that helps them feel good about themselves, which in turn helps them behave in a positive manner in the world.

lender.name: Merredith
lender.loan_because: My mother's family grew up in poverty, until my grandfather was able to get an education and raise his earnings. He went to college while working full time to support his five children. Because of his hard work and sacrifices, I've had the opportunity to get a college degree of my own, and improve my life. He passed away a few years ago, and I believe that helping hard-working families to improve their lives is the best way to honor him.
lender.occupational_info: I assist a 7th-grade teacher to help me prepare to be a teacher myself.

lender.name: susan
lender.loan_because: this is an efficient way of spreading the blessings we enjoy to others...

lender.name: landrobot
lender.loan_because: That's what cats do: they loan money. Yes, you received money from a cat. meow!
lender.occupational_info: "How does that work? Why has a cat lent to me? How can a cat lend to me? Does that cat really want his money back?"

lender.name: David & Theresa
lender.loan_because: We strongly believe in the free enterprise system. This is our small way of helping those in the world that do not have access to capital. It empowers those who borrow capital and are willing to work hard to build a better life for their family. You never know whose life you impacted thru these loans someday they may have direct impact upon the world we all live in. May God bless you all for supporting these projects.
lender.occupational_info: We both work hard to give our daughters a better life than we had.

lender.name: Mark
lender.occupational_info: God has been so good to me. He is blessing me with a family, with food to eat, with meaningful work and with interesting classes in school. I hope to share some of the feeling of good I have received with others.

lender.name: HENRY
lender.loan_because: I want to expand my world view
lender.occupational_info: Embarking on Peace Corps assignment after 23 years with IBM.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I want to do something good for people less fortunate than myself.
lender.occupational_info: I maintain and develop websites for a UK financial provider, helping to sell products and allow customers to view their policies online.

lender.name: Beth P
lender.occupational_info: Student

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: i want to be a missionary

lender.name: Haroon
lender.loan_because: I believe it is against human rights that half of the world's population lives under the poverty line.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student of political science and religion at Eastern Michigan University. I am originally from Pakistan. After my bachelors degree, I want to pursue a degree in Law.

lender.name: Eleandrus
lender.loan_because: it feels good to help others and see there businesses grow.

lender.name: Mike
lender.occupational_info: Veteran financial professional. 1995 Graduate of Towson State University. B. S. Mass Communications. 1990 Graduate of North Babylon High Long Island New York. Certifications - Series 6, 63, 26, Life, Health, Annuities & Long-Term Care.

lender.name: Don and Kay
lender.occupational_info: Don is self-employed and sells many different lines including jewelry and home decor items to different shops across California. Kay works for an organic skin care company, Alkatis.

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: Many people have tougher lives than I do
lender.occupational_info: Doing my part for a sustainable world

lender.name: Red Metal Box
lender.loan_because: We want everyone to become successful and we hope to do that through our success by giving back and helping people abroad and right here at home.
lender.occupational_info: We design and develop useful marketing and lead generating tools for small and large businesses.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: Everyone should be able to access loans for entrepreneurial endevours large or small whether they are rich or poor!
lender.occupational_info: I build and maintain elevators and escalators

lender.name: Alicia
lender.loan_because: I want for others opportunity & success!
lender.occupational_info: Educator
